attributes.action: Stop Council Stealing Our Green Space in Farnworth Bolton
attributes.additional_details:
Bolton at Home a company set up as a company who look after the housing and maintainence of council land and properties.
This "company" are trying to propose plans to bulid 30 Low rent homes on a small peice of green land surrounded by elderly peoples bungalows and family homes.
These homes are going to destroy a green spaced regularly used by the local community to walk their dogs  familys spend days on the green playing with the children in relative safety there is a long establish community surrounding this space, it is responsibly looked after by them.
This development is going to destroy a community it will reduce home values crime will shoot through the roof  there are NO guarantees about the quality of resident that will be allowed to inhabit these properties.
 please support our cause by siging this petition.
thank you for your time.
